name: DisConnect 4
description:
DisConnect 4 is basically a simple Connect 4. It's one of my class assignments and I wanted to make a game as simple as Connect 4 to a chill and pleasant experience.

The game will let you play with a friend in a beautiful pixel art game accompanied by some cool Japanese lo-fi musics.

Thanks to LennSan who made the animated background : 

- https://www.reddit.com/user/LennSan/

- https://lennsan.tumblr.com/

- https://www.artstation.com/lennartbutz

The musics are listed in this playlist :

- https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLWMeolHIg7XNhoFn4jbmLgQrirOa2aMI4
